```{r Problem 4}
# Generating Design Matrix X with size n = 100 and two covariates
n = 100
p = 2
set.seed(1)
X = matrix(rnorm(n*p, 0, 1), n, p)
beta = rnorm(p, 0, 1)

epsilon = rlaplace(n, mu = 1, sigma = 2)
Y = X%*%beta + epsilon
beta_hat = solve(t(X)%*%X) %*% t(X) %*% Y
beta_hat
```
